traits.name: Helpful
entries: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a {@dice 1d6} bonus to the {@dice d20} roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack's damage roll against one target.

traits.name: Tools
entries: The expert has {@item thieves' tools|phb} and a musical instrument.

actions.name: Extra Attack
entries: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the {@action Attack} action on its turn.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
